protocol.name: P-MTAB-26250
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana wild type ecotype (Col-0) and genotypes 35S::CO, co-10, aps1 y gbs-1 seedlings were cultivated in agar plates in long day conditions (16 h day/ 8 h dark) at 22 C in controlled environment cabinets for two weeks. Samples were collected at ZT 4 and immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen and processed.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-26251
protocol.text: Three independent sets of seedling plates (fully expanded cotyledons) of each line were sampled for RNA extraction, following the Trizol method (Chomczynski and Sacchi, 1987). The total RNA extracted from each sample was further purified using an RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the kit manual.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-26252
text: pdf of the protocol can be downloaded at TAIR

protocol.name: P-MTAB-26253
text: The cDNA was hybridized to the Affymetrix expression array ATH1-121501 as described by the manufacturer (Affymetrix,

protocol.name: P-MTAB-26254
text: Microarray data was processed from CEL files with FIESTA@BioinfoGP, an interactive server for analyzing DNA microarray experiments with replicates (
) and using the R package Bioconductor (
) for quality control, background correction, normalization and calculation of the expression levels. Three different biological replicates were used for each genotype.
